abilities.description: User can create large quantities of candle wax from their body and control it.
The wax can be hardened to become as strong as steel, useful for restraints and structures.
User can create life-sized wax sculptures that closely resemble real people.
User can create liquid wax that is extremely slippery, causing opponents to lose footing.
User can encase opponents in iron-hard wax to immobilize them, effective even against giants.

weaknesses.description: The wax can be quickly melted by high temperatures and flames.

reveals.information: The Devil Fruit is officially identified as the Doru Doru no Mi (Wax-Wax Fruit) by Vivi and Mr. 5.
The hardened wax is revealed to be as strong as steel.
Mr. 3 can create wax duplicates of people to deceive and trap opponents.
The wax can be used in liquid form to create slippery surfaces.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create and manipulate candle wax, making them a Candle Human.

abilities.description: User can make any part of their body explosive.
User creates explosive attacks with their kicks.

reveals.information: Mr. 5 demonstrates the Kick Bomb technique, showing he can make his kicks explosive.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to make any part of their body explode, including their breath and bodily secretions.

abilities.description: User can change their body weight from 1 kilogram to 10,000 kilograms at will.
User increases their weight while falling or stomping to create devastating crushing attacks.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to change their body weight at will.
